articles.heading: Faster font loading with font events
articles.description: Web fonts are great and make the web a more beautiful space; however, loading them can be slow, which results in an unwanted side effect: FOIT (Flash of Invisible Text).
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Improving front-end performance
articles.description: Last year I wrote a post, Need for Speed, where I shared my workflows and techniques along with the tools involved in the development of my site.
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Responsible social share links
articles.description: Social share scripts are convenient and easy to copy & paste but rely on JavaScript and add additional overhead to your site, which means more HTTP requests and slower load times.
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Responsive typography with Sass maps
articles.description: Managing consistent, typographic rhythm isn’t easy, but when the type is responsive, it makes things even more difficult. Fortunately Sass maps can help make responsive typography much more manageable.
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Managing responsive breakpoints with Sass maps
articles.description: Sass maps are handy for organizing values used repeatedly throughout a project (e.g. colors, z-index values). They can also help manage responsive breakpoints, and, with the help of a custom mixin, even make generating media queries a breeze.
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Google's mobile-friendly search results update
articles.description: Back in February 2015, Google announced that starting April 21 it would be expanding its use of mobile-friendliness as a ranking signal. Today is April 21.
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Canary all-in-one home security device review
articles.description: Canary is an all-in-one home security device that’ll watch your home and make sure everything is OK. It’s packed with features like motion detection and video recording, temperature and air-quality sensors, and remote access to control it, see recorded videos, and watch live.
articles.author: Rob Simpson

articles.heading: Enhance google search results with rich snippets
articles.description: Allow Google to create and provide rich snippets—detailed, relevant information for users based on their search queries, such as the average rating of a product or restaurant, or preparation time and rating of a recipe.
articles.author: Rob Simpson
